    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize. Sets all the handlers for the buttons.

      • saveNewPersonButtonHandler

        private void saveNewPersonButtonHandler()
        Button handler to save a person to the data file. Validates the fields before being able to press submit.

      • retrievePersonButtonHandler

        private void retrievePersonButtonHandler()

        Button handler to retrieve the last person from the file. If no person is found in the file it calls the noPreviousPersonFound() method.

      • noPreviousPersonFound

        private void noPreviousPersonFound()
        Label error text for when a person isn't found but the file exists. ( Empty file )

      • close

        private void close()
        Closes the application

      • clearDataFile

        private void clearDataFile()
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Clears the data from the file without deleting it.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • draggableMenu

        private void draggableMenu()
        Method for custom draggable menu.

      • clearAllFieldsButtonHandler

        public void clearAllFieldsButtonHandler()
        Clears all fields on the GUI.

      • addFieldsToList

        private void addFieldsToList(java.util.List<com.jfoenix.controls.JFXTextField> list)
        Adds all the text fields to a list so it can easily be traversed for checking validation.
        Parameters:
        list - A list of all the current text fields.

      • about

        public void about()
           throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                  java.io.IOException
        About. Links to my github page.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - the uri syntax exception
        java.io.IOException - the io exception

      • validateFields

        private boolean validateFields()
        Validate the fields. If one of them is empty it'll end and update the lblErrorText text field.
        Returns:
        true if all fields are filled. False if one of them isn't filled out.

      • checkIfFieldNotEmpty

        private boolean checkIfFieldNotEmpty(com.jfoenix.controls.JFXTextField jfxTextField)
        Generic method to check if the method isn't used. Helped method for validateFields() method.
        Parameters:
        jfxTextField - takes the list textFieldList as a paramater
        Returns:
        true if the fields are not empty. False if they are.
